title: LEL
subtitle: Living Environments Laboratory
description: Worked on a 3D interactive visualization of neutrino activity from the IceCube Neutrino Observatory in Antarctica.
Created interactive displays of neutrinos colliding with the detectors over time.
Manipulated large datasets to visualize photon paths and arrays of neutrino detectors in OpenGL.
Optimized the project to run effectively and smoothly in the CAVE (a six-sided immersive virtual reality environment).
